    return /^([a-zA-Z0-9_-])+@([a-zA-Z0-9_-])+((.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]{2,3}){1,2})$/.test(s)
}

# æ˜¯å¦ios

export const isIos = () => {
    var u = navigator.userAgent;
    if (u.indexOf('Android') > -1 || u.indexOf('Linux') > -1) {  //å®‰å“æ‰‹æœº
        return false
    } else if (u.indexOf('iPhone') > -1) {//è‹¹æœæ‰‹æœº
        return true
    } else if (u.indexOf('iPad') > -1) {//iPad
        return false
    } else if (u.indexOf('Windows Phone') > -1) {//winphoneæ‰‹æœº
        return false
    } else {
        return false
    }
}

# æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºPCç«¯

export const isPC = () => {
    var userAgentInfo = navigator.userAgent;
    var Agents = ["Android", "iPhone",
        "SymbianOS", "Windows Phone",
        "iPad", "iPod"];
    var flag = true;
    for (var v = 0; v < Agents.length; v++) {
        if (userAgentInfo.indexOf(Agents[v]) > 0) {
            flag = false;
            break;
        }
    }
    return flag;
}

# è·å–urlå‚æ•°

export const getQueryString = (name) => {
    const reg = new RegExp('(^|&)' + name + '=([^&]*)(&|$)', 'i');
    const search = window.location.search.split('?')[1] || '';
    const r = search.match(reg) || [];
    return r[2];
}

# åŠ¨æ€å¼•å…¥js

export const injectScript = (src) => {
    const s = document.createElement('script');
    s.type = 'text/javascript';
    s.async = true;
    s.src = src;
    const t = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    t.parentNode.insertBefore(s, t);
}

# æ ¹æ®urlåœ°å€ä¸‹è½½

export const download = (url) => {
    var isChrome = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().indexOf('chrome') > -1;
    var isSafari = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().indexOf('safari') > -1;
    if (isChrome || isSafari) {
        var link = document.createElement('a');
        link.href = url;
        if (link.download !== undefined) {
            var fileName = url.substring(url.lastIndexOf('/') + 1, url.length);
            link.download = fileName;
        }
        if (document.createEvent) {
            var e = document.createEvent('MouseEvents');
            e.initEvent('click', true, true);
            link.dispatchEvent(e);
            return true;
        }
    }
    if (url.indexOf('?') === -1) {
        url += '?download';
    }
    window.open(url, '_self');
    return true;
}

# elæ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«æŸä¸ªclass

export const hasClass = (el, className) => {
    let reg = new RegExp('(^|\\s)' + className + '(\\s|$)')
    return reg.test(el.className)
}

# elæ·»åŠ æŸä¸ªclass

export const addClass = (el, className) => {
    if (hasClass(el, className)) {
        return
    }
    let newClass = el.className.split(' ')
    newClass.push(className)
    el.className = newClass.join(' ')
}

# elå»é™¤æŸä¸ªclass

export const removeClass = (el, className) => {
    if (!hasClass(el, className)) {
        return
    }
    let reg = new RegExp('(^|\\s)' + className + '(\\s|$)', 'g')
    el.className = el.className.replace(reg, ' ')
}

# è·å–æ»šåŠ¨çš„åæ ‡

export const getScrollPosition = (el = window) => ({
    x: el.pageXOffset !== undefined ? el.pageXOffset : el.scrollLeft,
    y: el.pageYOffset !== undefined ? el.pageYOffset : el.scrollTop
});

# æ»šåŠ¨åˆ°é¡¶éƒ¨

export const scrollToTop = () => {
    const c = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop;
    if (c > 0) {
        window.requestAnimationFrame(scrollToTop);
        window.scrollTo(0, c - c / 8);
    }
}

# elæ˜¯å¦åœ¨è§†å£èŒƒå›´å†…

export const elementIsVisibleInViewport = (el, partiallyVisible = false) => {
    const { top, left, bottom, right } = el.getBoundingClientRect();
    const { innerHeight, innerWidth } = window;
    return partiallyVisible
        ? ((top > 0 && top < innerHeight) || (bottom > 0 && bottom < innerHeight)) &&
        ((left > 0 && left < innerWidth) || (right > 0 && right < innerWidth))
        : top >= 0 && left >= 0 && bottom <= innerHeight && right <= innerWidth;
}

# æ´—ç‰Œç®—æ³•éšæœº

export const shuffle = (arr) => {
    var result = [],
        random;
    while (arr.length > 0) {
        random = Math.floor(Math.random() * arr.length);
        result.push(arr[random])
        arr.splice(random, 1)
    }
    return result;
}

# åŠ«æŒç²˜è´´æ¿

export const copyTextToClipboard = (value) => {
    var textArea = document.createElement("textarea");
    textArea.style.background = 'transparent';
    textArea.value = value;
    document.body.appendChild(textArea);
    textArea.select();
    try {
        var successful = document.execCommand('copy');
    } catch (err) {
        console.log('Oops, unable to copy');
    }
    document.body.removeChild(textArea);
}

# åˆ¤æ–­ç±»å‹é›†åˆ

export const checkStr = (str, type) => {
    switch (type) {
        case 'phone':   //æ‰‹æœºå·ç 
            return /^1[3|4|5|6|7|8|9][0-9]{9}$/.test(str);
        case 'tel':     //åº§æœº
            return /^(0\d{2,3}-\d{7,8})(-\d{1,4})?$/.test(str);
        case 'card':    //èº«ä»½è¯
            return /(^\d{15}$)|(^\d{18}$)|(^\d{17}(\d|X|x)$)/.test(str);
        case 'pwd':     //å¯†ç ä»¥å­—æ¯å¼€å¤´ï¼Œé•¿åº¦åœ¨6~18ä¹‹é—´ï¼Œåªèƒ½åŒ…å«å­—æ¯ã€æ•°å­—å’Œä¸‹åˆ’çº¿
            return /^[a-zA-Z]\w{5,17}$/.test(str)
        case 'postal':  //é‚®æ”¿ç¼–ç 
            return /[1-9]\d{5}(?!\d)/.test(str);
        case 'QQ':      //QQå·
            return /^[1-9][0-9]{4,9}$/.test(str);
        case 'email':   //é‚®ç®±
            return /^[\w-]+(\.[\w-]+)*@[\w-]+(\.[\w-]+)+$/.test(str);
        case 'money':   //é‡‘é¢(å°æ•°ç‚¹2ä½)
            return /^\d*(?:\.\d{0,2})?$/.test(str);
        case 'URL':     //ç½‘å€
            return /(http|ftp|https):\/\/[\w\-_]+(\.[\w\-_]+)+([\w\-\.,@?^=%&:/~\+#]*[\w\-\@?^=%&/~\+#])?/.test(str)
        case 'IP':      //IP
            return /((?:(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4]\\d|[01]?\\d?\\d)\\.){3}(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4]\\d|[01]?\\d?\\d))/.test(str);
        case 'date':    //æ—¥æœŸæ—¶é—´
            return /^(\d{4})\-(\d{2})\-(\d{2}) (\d{2})(?:\:\d{2}|:(\d{2}):(\d{2}))$/.test(str) || /^(\d{4})\-(\d{2})\-(\d{2})$/.test(str)
        case 'number':  //æ•°å­—
            return /^[0-9]$/.test(str);
        case 'english': //è‹±æ–‡
            return /^[a-zA-Z]+$/.test(str);
        case 'chinese': //ä¸­æ–‡
            return /^[\\u4E00-\\u9FA5]+$/.test(str);
        case 'lower':   //å°å†™
            return /^[a-z]+$/.test(str);
        case 'upper':   //å¤§å†™
            return /^[A-Z]+$/.test(str);
        case 'HTML':    //HTMLæ ‡è®°
            return /<("[^"]*"|'[^']*'|[^'">])*>/.test(str);
        default:
            return true;
    }
}

# ä¸¥æ ¼çš„èº«ä»½è¯æ ¡éªŒ

export const isCardID = (sId) => {
    if (!/(^\d{15}$)|(^\d{17}(\d|X|x)$)/.test(sId)) {
        console.log('ä½ è¾“å…¥çš„èº«ä»½è¯é•¿åº¦æˆ–æ ¼å¼é”™è¯¯')
        return false
    }
    //èº«ä»½è¯åŸå¸‚
    var aCity = { 11: "åŒ—äº¬", 12: "å¤©æ´¥", 13: "æ²³åŒ—", 14: "å±±è¥¿", 15: "å†…è’™å¤", 21: "è¾½å®", 22: "å‰æ—", 23: "é»‘é¾™æ±Ÿ", 31: "ä¸Šæµ·", 32: "æ±Ÿè‹", 33: "æµ™æ±Ÿ", 34: "å®‰å¾½", 35: "ç¦å»º", 36: "æ±Ÿè¥¿", 37: "å±±ä¸œ", 41: "æ²³å—", 42: "æ¹–åŒ—", 43: "æ¹–å—", 44: "å¹¿ä¸œ", 45: "å¹¿è¥¿", 46: "æµ·å—", 50: "é‡åº†", 51: "å››å·", 52: "è´µå·", 53: "äº‘å—", 54: "è¥¿è—", 61: "é™•è¥¿", 62: "ç”˜è‚ƒ", 63: "é’æµ·", 64: "å®å¤", 65: "æ–°ç–†", 71: "å°æ¹¾", 81: "é¦™æ¸¯", 82: "æ¾³é—¨", 91: "å›½å¤–" };
    if (!aCity[parseInt(sId.substr(0, 2))]) {
        console.log('ä½ çš„èº«ä»½è¯åœ°åŒºéæ³•')
        return false
    }

    // å‡ºç”Ÿæ—¥æœŸéªŒè¯
    var sBirthday = (sId.substr(6, 4) + "-" + Number(sId.substr(10, 2)) + "-" + Number(sId.substr(12, 2))).replace(/-/g, "/"),
        d = new Date(sBirthday)
    if (sBirthday != (d.getFullYear() + "/" + (d.getMonth() + 1) + "/" + d.getDate())) {
        console.log('èº«ä»½è¯ä¸Šçš„å‡ºç”Ÿæ—¥æœŸéæ³•')
        return false
    }

    // èº«ä»½è¯å·ç æ ¡éªŒ
    var sum = 0,
        weights = [7, 9, 10, 5, 8, 4, 2, 1, 6, 3, 7, 9, 10, 5, 8, 4, 2],
        codes = "10X98765432"
    for (var i = 0; i < sId.length - 1; i++) {
        sum += sId[i] * weights[i];
    }
    var last = codes[sum % 11]; //è®¡ç®—å‡ºæ¥çš„æœ€åä¸€ä½èº«ä»½è¯å·ç 
    if (sId[sId.length - 1] != last) {
        console.log('ä½ è¾“å…¥çš„èº«ä»½è¯å·éæ³•')
        return false
    }

    return true
}

# éšæœºæ•°èŒƒå›´

export const random = (min, max) => {
    if (arguments.length === 2) {
        return Math.floor(min + Math.random() * ((max + 1) - min))
    } else {
        return null;
    }
}

# å°†é˜¿æ‹‰ä¼¯æ•°å­—ç¿»è¯‘æˆä¸­æ–‡çš„å¤§å†™æ•°å­—

export const numberToChinese = (num) => {
    var AA = new Array("é›¶", "ä¸€", "äºŒ", "ä¸‰", "å››", "äº”", "å…­", "ä¸ƒ", "å…«", "ä¹", "å");
    var BB = new Array("", "å", "ç™¾", "ä»Ÿ", "è¬", "å„„", "ç‚¹", "");
    var a = ("" + num).replace(/(^0*)/g, "").split("."),
        k = 0,
        re = "";
    for (var i = a[0].length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        switch (k) {
            case 0:
                re = BB[7] + re;
                break;
            case 4:
                if (!new RegExp("0{4}//d{" + (a[0].length - i - 1) + "}$")
                    .test(a[0]))
                    re = BB[4] + re;
                break;
            case 8:
                re = BB[5] + re;
                BB[7] = BB[5];
                k = 0;
                break;
        }
        if (k % 4 == 2 && a[0].charAt(i + 2) != 0 && a[0].charAt(i + 1) == 0)
            re = AA[0] + re;
        if (a[0].charAt(i) != 0)
            re = AA[a[0].charAt(i)] + BB[k % 4] + re;
        k++;
    }

    if (a.length > 1) // åŠ ä¸Šå°æ•°éƒ¨åˆ†(å¦‚æœæœ‰å°æ•°éƒ¨åˆ†)
    {
        re += BB[6];
        for (var i = 0; i < a[1].length; i++)
            re += AA[a[1].charAt(i)];
    }
    if (re == 'ä¸€å')
        re = "å";
    if (re.match(/^ä¸€/) && re.length == 3)
        re = re.replace("ä¸€", "");
    return re;
}

# å°†æ•°å­—è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå¤§å†™é‡‘é¢

export const changeToChinese = (Num) => {
    //åˆ¤æ–­å¦‚æœä¼ é€’è¿›æ¥çš„ä¸æ˜¯å­—ç¬¦çš„è¯è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå­—ç¬¦
    if (typeof Num == "number") {
        Num = new String(Num);
    };
    Num = Num.replace(/,/g, "") //æ›¿æ¢tomoney()ä¸­çš„â€œ,â€
    Num = Num.replace(/ /g, "") //æ›¿æ¢tomoney()ä¸­çš„ç©ºæ ¼
    Num = Num.replace(/ï¿¥/g, "") //æ›¿æ¢æ‰å¯èƒ½å‡ºç°çš„ï¿¥å­—ç¬¦
    if (isNaN(Num)) { //éªŒè¯è¾“å…¥çš„å­—ç¬¦æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºæ•°å­—
        //alert("è¯·æ£€æŸ¥å°å†™é‡‘é¢æ˜¯å¦æ­£ç¡®");
        return "";
    };
    //å­—ç¬¦å¤„ç†å®Œæ¯•åå¼€å§‹è½¬æ¢ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨å‰åä¸¤éƒ¨åˆ†åˆ†åˆ«è½¬æ¢
    var part = String(Num).split(".");
    var newchar = "";
    //å°æ•°ç‚¹å‰è¿›è¡Œè½¬åŒ–
    for (var i = part[0].length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        if (part[0].length > 10) {
            return "";
            //è‹¥æ•°é‡è¶…è¿‡æ‹¾äº¿å•ä½ï¼Œæç¤º
        }
        var tmpnewchar = ""
        var perchar = part[0].charAt(i);
        switch (perchar) {
            case "0":
                tmpnewchar = "é›¶" + tmpnewchar;
                break;
            case "1":
                tmpnewchar = "å£¹" + tmpnewchar;
                break;
            case "2":
                tmpnewchar = "è´°" + tmpnewchar;
                break;
            case "3":
                tmpnewchar = "å" + tmpnewchar;
                break;
            case "4":
                tmpnewchar = "è‚†" + tmpnewchar;
                break;
            case "5":
                tmpnewchar = "ä¼" + tmpnewchar;
                break;
            case "6":
                tmpnewchar = "é™†" + tmpnewchar;
                break;
            case "7":
                tmpnewchar = "æŸ’" + tmpnewchar;
                break;
            case "8":
                tmpnewchar = "æŒ" + tmpnewchar;
                break;
            case "9":
                tmpnewchar = "ç–" + tmpnewchar;
                break;
        }
        switch (part[0].length - i - 1) {
            case 0:
                tmpnewchar = tmpnewchar + "å…ƒ";
                break;
            case 1:
                if (perchar != 0) tmpnewchar = tmpnewchar + "æ‹¾";
                break;
            case 2:
                if (perchar != 0) tmpnewchar = tmpnewchar + "ä½°";
                break;
            case 3:
                if (perchar != 0) tmpnewchar = tmpnewchar + "ä»Ÿ";
                break;
            case 4:
                tmpnewchar = tmpnewchar + "ä¸‡";
                break;
            case 5:
                if (perchar != 0) tmpnewchar = tmpnewchar + "æ‹¾";
                break;
            case 6:
                if (perchar != 0) tmpnewchar = tmpnewchar + "ä½°";
                break;
            case 7:
                if (perchar != 0) tmpnewchar = tmpnewchar + "ä»Ÿ";
                break;
            case 8:
                tmpnewchar = tmpnewchar + "äº¿";
                break;
            case 9:
                tmpnewchar = tmpnewchar + "æ‹¾";
                break;
        }
        var newchar = tmpnewchar + newchar;
    }
    //å°æ•°ç‚¹ä¹‹åè¿›è¡Œè½¬åŒ–
    if (Num.indexOf(".") != -1) {
        if (part[1].length > 2) {
            // alert("å°æ•°ç‚¹ä¹‹ååªèƒ½ä¿ç•™ä¸¤ä½,ç³»ç»Ÿå°†è‡ªåŠ¨æˆªæ–­");
            part[1] = part[1].substr(0, 2)
        }
        for (i = 0; i < part[1].length; i++) {
            tmpnewchar = ""
            perchar = part[1].charAt(i)
            switch (perchar) {
                case "0":
                    tmpnewchar = "é›¶" + tmpnewchar;
                    break;
                case "1":
                    tmpnewchar = "å£¹" + tmpnewchar;
                    break;
                case "2":
                    tmpnewchar = "è´°" + tmpnewchar;
                    break;
                case "3":
                    tmpnewchar = "å" + tmpnewchar;
                    break;
                case "4":
                    tmpnewchar = "è‚†" + tmpnewchar;
                    break;
                case "5":
                    tmpnewchar = "ä¼" + tmpnewchar;
                    break;
                case "6":
                    tmpnewchar = "é™†" + tmpnewchar;
                    break;
                case "7":
                    tmpnewchar = "æŸ’" + tmpnewchar;
                    break;
                case "8":
                    tmpnewchar = "æŒ" + tmpnewchar;
                    break;
                case "9":
                    tmpnewchar = "ç–" + tmpnewchar;
                    break;
            }
            if (i == 0) tmpnewchar = tmpnewchar + "è§’";
            if (i == 1) tmpnewchar = tmpnewchar + "åˆ†";
            newchar = newchar + tmpnewchar;
        }
    }
    //æ›¿æ¢æ‰€æœ‰æ— ç”¨æ±‰å­—
    while (newchar.search("é›¶é›¶") != -1)
        newchar = newchar.replace("é›¶é›¶", "é›¶");
    newchar = newchar.replace("é›¶äº¿", "äº¿");
    newchar = newchar.replace("äº¿ä¸‡", "äº¿");
    newchar = newchar.replace("é›¶ä¸‡", "ä¸‡");
    newchar = newchar.replace("é›¶å…ƒ", "å…ƒ");
    newchar = newchar.replace("é›¶è§’", "");
    newchar = newchar.replace("é›¶åˆ†", "");
    if (newchar.charAt(newchar.length - 1) == "å…ƒ") {
        newchar = newchar + "æ•´"
    }
    return newchar;
}

# æ•°ç»„æ’åºï¼Œ{type} 1ï¼šä»å°åˆ°å¤§ 2ï¼šä»å¤§åˆ°å° 3ï¼šéšæœº

export const sort = (arr, type = 1) => {
    return arr.sort((a, b) => {
        switch (type) {
            case 1:
                return a - b;
            case 2:
                return b - a;
            case 3:
                return Math.random() - 0.5;
            default:
                return arr;
        }
    })
}

# å»é‡

export const unique = (arr) => {
    if (Array.hasOwnProperty('from')) {
        return Array.from(new Set(arr));
    } else {
        var n = {}, r = [];
        for (var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
            if (!n[arr[i]]) {
                n[arr[i]] = true;
                r.push(arr[i]);
            }
        }
        return r;
    }
}

export const union = (a, b) => {
    var newArr = a.concat(b);
    return this.unique(newArr);
}

# æ±‚ä¸¤ä¸ªé›†åˆçš„äº¤é›†

export const intersect = (a, b) => {
    var _this = this;
    a = this.unique(a);
    return this.map(a, function (o) {
        return _this.contains(b, o) ? o : null;
    });
}

export const remove = (arr, ele) => {
    var index = arr.indexOf(ele);
    if (index > -1) {
        arr.splice(index, 1);
    }
    return arr;
}

export const formArray = (ary) => {
    var arr = [];
    if (Array.isArray(ary)) {
        arr = ary;
    } else {
        arr = Array.prototype.slice.call(ary);
    };
    return arr;
}

# å»é™¤ç©ºæ ¼,type: 1-æ‰€æœ‰ç©ºæ ¼ 2-å‰åç©ºæ ¼ 3-å‰ç©ºæ ¼ 4-åç©ºæ ¼

export const trim = (str, type) => {
    type = type || 1
    switch (type) {
        case 1:
            return str.replace(/\s+/g, "");
        case 2:
            return str.replace(/(^\s*)|(\s*$)/g, "");
        case 3:
            return str.replace(/(^\s*)/g, "");
        case 4:
            return str.replace(/(\s*$)/g, "");
        default:
            return str;
    }
}

# å­—ç¬¦è½¬æ¢ï¼Œtype: 1:é¦–å­—æ¯å¤§å†™ 2ï¼šé¦–å­—æ¯å°å†™ 3ï¼šå¤§å°å†™è½¬æ¢ 4ï¼šå…¨éƒ¨å¤§å†™ 5ï¼šå…¨éƒ¨å°å†™

export const changeCase = (str, type) => {
    type = type || 4
    switch (type) {
        case 1:
            return str.replace(/\b\w+\b/g, function (word) {
                return word.substring(0, 1).toUpperCase() + word.substring(1).toLowerCase();

            });
        case 2:
            return str.replace(/\b\w+\b/g, function (word) {
                return word.substring(0, 1).toLowerCase() + word.substring(1).toUpperCase();
            });
        case 3:
            return str.split('').map(function (word) {
                if (/[a-z]/.test(word)) {
                    return word.toUpperCase();
                } else {
                    return word.toLowerCase()
                }
            }).join('')
        case 4:
            return str.toUpperCase();
        case 5:
            return str.toLowerCase();
        default:
            return str;
    }
}

# æ£€æµ‹å¯†ç å¼ºåº¦

export const checkPwd = (str) => {
    var Lv = 0;
    if (str.length < 6) {
        return Lv
    }
    if (/[0-9]/.test(str)) {
        Lv++
    }
    if (/[a-z]/.test(str)) {
        Lv++
    }
    if (/[A-Z]/.test(str)) {
        Lv++
    }
    if (/[\.|-|_]/.test(str)) {
        Lv++
    }
    return Lv;
}

# å‡½æ•°èŠ‚æµå™¨

export const debounce = (fn, time, interval = 200) => {
    if (time - (window.debounceTimestamp || 0) > interval) {
        fn && fn();
        window.debounceTimestamp = time;
    }
}

export const insertStr = (source, index, newStr) => {

    return str;

# åˆ¤æ–­ä¸¤ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¦é”®å€¼ç›¸åŒ

export const isObjectEqual = (a, b) => {
    var aProps = Object.getOwnPropertyNames(a);
    var bProps = Object.getOwnPropertyNames(b);

    if (aProps.length !== bProps.length) {
        return false;
    }

    for (var i = 0; i < aProps.length; i++) {
        var propName = aProps[i];

        if (a[propName] !== b[propName]) {
            return false;
        }
    }
    return true;
}

# 16è¿›åˆ¶é¢œè‰²è½¬RGBRGBAå­—ç¬¦ä¸²

export const colorToRGB = (val, opa) => {

    var pattern = /^(#?)[a-fA-F0-9]{6}$/; //16è¿›åˆ¶é¢œè‰²å€¼æ ¡éªŒè§„åˆ™
    var isOpa = typeof opa == 'number'; //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æœ‰è®¾ç½®ä¸é€æ˜åº¦

    if (!pattern.test(val)) { //å¦‚æœå€¼ä¸ç¬¦åˆè§„åˆ™è¿”å›ç©ºå­—ç¬¦
        return '';
    }

    var v = val.replace(/#/, ''); //å¦‚æœæœ‰#å·å…ˆå»é™¤#å·
    var rgbArr = [];
    var rgbStr = '';

    for (var i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
        var item = v.substring(i * 2, i * 2 + 2);
        var num = parseInt(item, 16);
        rgbArr.push(num);
    }

    rgbStr = rgbArr.join();
    rgbStr = 'rgb' + (isOpa ? 'a' : '') + '(' + rgbStr + (isOpa ? ',' + opa : '') + ')';
    return rgbStr;
}

# è¿½åŠ urlå‚æ•°

export const appendQuery = (url, key, value) => {
    var options = key;
    if (typeof options == 'string') {
        options = {};
        options[key] = value;
    }
    options = $.param(options);
    if (url.includes('?')) {
        url += '&' + options
    } else {
        url += '?' + options
    }
    return url;
}
